title: Whereas by proclamation, bearing date the nineteenth day of June last, it was declared and appointed, that the first payment of the years rent, payable by the Act of Explanation, out of all the lands in this kingdom, which were returned by the civil survey to belong to any Irish papist, popish recusant, or Roman Catholick ... by the Lord Deputy and Council, Ossory.
author: Ireland. Lord Deputy.
publisher: Printed by John Crook ... and are to be sold by Samuel Dancer ...,
